name: test_insufficient_contract_balance_rejected
description: Verifies that verification storage fails when contract has insufficient available balance. The NEAR protocol enforces storage costs at transaction commit time, preventing state changes that would exceed the account's balance. This test dynamically calculates the drain amount based on actual storage usage to ensure reliability.
descriptionHtml: Verifies that verification storage fails when contract has insufficient available balance. The NEAR protocol enforces storage costs at transaction commit time, preventing state changes that would exceed the account's balance. This test dynamically calculates the drain amount based on actual storage usage to ensure reliability.
